text: ākavē, uṅkaḷāl iyaṉṟa varai allāhvukku añci naṭantu koḷḷuṅkaḷ; (avaṉ pōtaṉaikaḷaic) cevitāḻttik kēḷuṅkaḷ; avaṉukku vaḻipaṭuṅkaḷ; (avaṉ pātaiyil) celavu ceyyuṅkaḷ; (itu) uṅkaḷukkē mēlāṉa naṉmaiyāka irukkum; aṉṟiyum; evarkaḷ ulōpattaṉattiliruntu kākkappaṭukiṟārkaḷō, avarkaḷ tām veṟṟi peṟṟavarkaḷ
